name: Jaanavar Jal
description: A massive, amphibious creature capable of thriving in both water and on land. It has powerful jaws and the ability to grapple foes with ease.
memorable: It regenerates health each turn unless it suffers cold damage, making it a persistent threat in battle.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its environment, using its strength and regeneration to control other creatures.
relations: Might be encountered in proximity to other aquatic creatures or as a ruler of its territory.
environment: Can be found in freshwater and coastal regions, often lurking in swamps or rivers.
strengths: Exhibits significant physical strength and durability, capable of dealing considerable damage while healing every turn.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage which can temporarily interrupt its regenerative abilities.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with a powerful bite and grappling constrict action, also possesses a devastating flaming oil attack.
most_powerful_ability: Can heal for 10 hit points at the start of its turn due to its regeneration ability.
senses: Possesses blindsense out to 60 ft., allowing it to detect creatures without sight.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, enabling it to notice threats effectively.
additional_information: Only dies if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and cannot regenerate.
Flaming Oil Spittle can control space on the battlefield by threatening an area.
Exceptional at grappling smaller creatures to restrain them.
Natural armor provides a solid defense against attacks.
Cold damage negates its regeneration for a turn.
